overview.title: Overview
overview.description: We want you to be satisfied with every purchase. This policy explains how returns and refunds work, including timelines and eligibility requirements.

eligibility.title: Refund Eligibility
eligibility.description: To be eligible for a refund, please ensure that:

items.condition: The item is unused, in original condition and in original packaging.
items.timeline: The return request is submitted within 14 days of delivery, unless otherwise stated.
items.proof: Proof of purchase is provided (order number or receipt).
items.excluded: Items marked as final sale or non-returnable are excluded.

howToInitiate.title: How to Initiate a Return

steps.contact: Contact our support team with your order number and reason for return.
steps.ship: Ship the item via trackable method; include all original accessories and tags.

howToInitiate.description: After receiving and inspecting the item, we will confirm refund approval or denial.

items.method: Approved refunds are issued to the original payment method.
items.timing: Processing time is typically 5â€“10 business days after approval; bank times may vary.
items.shipping: Shipping fees are not refunded unless the return is due to our error or a defective item.

items.giftCards: Gift cards and digital items after delivery.
items.personalized: Personalized or custom-made items, unless defective.
items.condition: Items not in original condition, damaged or with missing parts for reasons not due to our error.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For questions about this Refund Policy or to initiate a return, write to us at
